div.p: This is a paragraph that contains just text.

p.q: This one contains just a quote.

div.p: The following paragraph should not contain a quote, but the next two should
This one contains a quote, some intervening text, and then another quote.
This one contains two adjacent quotes with intervening whitespace.
This one contains twoadjacent quotes with no intervening whitespace.
This one contains quoteimmediate textanother quote
This one contains a bunch of quotes, some adjacent and some not.
